ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend this course! This course is very helpful, and also very interesting. Students can benefit a lot from this course.
I would recommend the course to other students.
We learned some good techniques to improve the english skills, but the motivation for actually doing those has to come from each student itself.

Teaching in American Classroom is a course for international student who are intended to be a teaching fellow during their PhD study. This course will definitely prepare them for teaching in terms of improving their language skills. After this course, I feel more confident in both teaching and presentations. I hope I could continue to learn more teaching skills which are specific to my major in the future.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course improved my English skill a lot.
It will help to improve the teaching skills

I did several presentations and the contents are all based on my thesis topics. During the preparations for my presentations, I got a good chance to organize my project and tried to deliver the most important information to the audience. I also felt more enthusiastic for my research and teaching in the future.
